revised_title: Chaos and Forecasting: A New Approach to Predicting and Analyzing Chaotic Stochastic Systems
tldr: This article introduces a new measure of sensitivity to initial conditions in stochastic systems and explores its connection with nonlinear prediction and statistical estimation. The authors propose a new approach to predicting and analyzing chaotic stochastic systems, using modern statistical developments to construct pointwise predictors and predictive intervals/distributions. They also discuss the challenges of predicting chaotic systems and the importance of understanding the sensitivity of conditional distributions to initial conditions.
